definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Mastic is the recommended adhesive for gluing indoor mosaic tiles.
sentences.chinese: 乳香是室內馬賽克瓷磚粘合膠建議。

sentences.english: In the middle of the centerpiece mosaic hangs a chandelier encased in a blue glass cube.
sentences.chinese: 頂面馬賽克圖騰的中心掛着罩着藍色玻璃的枝形吊燈。

sentences.english: Our continuously innovated products will lead the tide of mosaic.
sentences.chinese: 產品不斷創新前路無止，引領馬賽克發展時尚潮流。

sentences.english: This year , we say goodbye together to the mosaic age of homo * * * uality.
sentences.chinese: 今年，我們集體告別同性戀的馬賽克時代。

sentences.english: This regular mosaic is a pattern made up of equilateral triangles.
sentences.chinese: 這個規則的馬賽克是由多個等邊三角形拼接而成。

sentences.english: Washing bath area, we choose the vitreous mosaic that is close to with wall paint color.
sentences.chinese: 在洗浴區，我們選用與牆漆顏色接近的玻璃馬賽克。

sentences.english: Shadows fell in tessellated patterns of grey and black.
sentences.chinese: 投下的陰影組成了灰黑相嵌的馬賽克圖案。

sentences.english: Concise and contemporary blue mosaic partition wall, your person finds everything new and fresh.
sentences.chinese: 簡潔現代的藍色馬賽克隔斷牆，令人耳目一新。

sentences.english: Clean up the extra cement and remained glue on the surface of the laid mosaic with cloth or soft.
sentences.chinese: 用布料或柔軟物擦去馬賽克表面的白水泥和糊漿。

sentences.english: The most conspicuous and eye-catching mosaic glass which he.
sentences.chinese: 這教堂裝上圓形的馬賽克式玻璃窗。

sentences.english: Mosaic may appear when zooming in on the voxel surface.
sentences.chinese: 體素表面投影圖象的放大操作容易產生馬賽克。

sentences.english: How about a mosaic jewelery box made from recycled garbage or some paper roll beads?
sentences.chinese: 喜歡回收材料或紙珠子製成的馬賽克首飾盒嗎？

sentences.english: Red paste-up decoration can be said to be an excellent use of color change carriers.
sentences.chinese: 馬賽克拼花裝飾可以說是運用色彩變化的絕好載體。

sentences.english: Mosaic variegated green, white and pink, heart-shaped.
sentences.chinese: 綠色，白色和粉紅色組合成的心型馬賽克斑葉。

sentences.english: Mastic and Thinset are the recommended adhesives for gluing mosaic tiles.
sentences.chinese: 乳香和Thinset是馬賽克瓷磚膠粘合劑的建議。

definition: "sensational headline writers", people who write misleading titles in order to generate clicks from Internet users/clickbait
to talk drivel/to assert sth without a proper understanding or basis in fact/not to know what one is talking about
to glue to/to paste onto/to stick on/also written 粘貼|粘贴[zhan1 tie1]
to disturb/to look for trouble/to stir up a row/to bother sb intentionally
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
mojibake (nonsense characters displayed when software fails to render text according to its intended character encoding)
